text: Excellent products (some items are authentic Jaffna produce - I havenâ€™t even found these readily available in Colombo!) great service and reasonably priced. They also do short eats and other food stuff on order. The rolls are fantastic! Highly recommended!
A Sri Lankan grocery store. You can find many varieties of Sri Lankan brands here. Quality is good.
This is a Sri Lankan grocery store,  where you can find Sri Lankan products including spices, variety of biscuits and traditional rice for a reasonable price.
Amazing service, can find great Sri Lankan spices and a variety of food. Like the fact they have Sri Lankan ambewala yoghurt (ambewela) and watalaplan dessert. The lady at the store is very helpful
Great place to get Sri Lankan grocery items.  Appreciate the service too
